# resolvedEndpoint

**Instance Property**

The currently targeted remote endpoint.

## Declaration

```swift
var resolvedEndpoint: NWEndpoint? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use Key-Value Observing (KVO) to watch this property.

## Selecting remote endpoints

- **tryNextResolvedEndpoint()**: Mark the current value of resolvedEndpoint as unusable, and try to switch to the next available endpoint.

items.description: Mark the current value of resolvedEndpoint as unusable, and try to switch to the next available endpoint.
items.name: tryNextResolvedEndpoint()
